message.name: ERR_XRV_WITHDRAWAL_REASON_EXISTS
message.locale: The Withdrawal Reason has already been added to this Online Application.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_INTAKE_APPLICATION_TYPE
message.locale: Intake Application Type ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_REASON_CODE
message.locale: A reason must be selected from the withdrawal request reason codetable.
